Author: alunatniff
Text: Hey I’m sure some others will come along with much better advice but I think you really need to let someone in your personal life know about this. The fact that you know you don’t want this and want to stop this trajectory means you really should owe it to yourself to keep progressing in recovery. Though, it is hard to take those steps alone and it really helps to have the people around you clued in and able to help.
